pages.text: $(bred)Giga Gargantuar$() just broke up with its girlfriend.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)600$()$(br)$(bred)Attack Damage$() : $(l)Deadly$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : $(bred)Enemies can not escape when being aimed by it$(). It will $(l)throw 3 Imps$() when health is lower than a half. Each Attack will $(bred)highly damage$() to $(l)all enemies nearby$().
